    Total of product: {{ selectedFoods.length }}

    Total Price: 0 FCFA

    import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../services/cart.service'; import { ISFood } from '../shared/model/ISFood'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit{ public selectedFoods: ISFood[] = []; constructor(private cartService: CartService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.cartService.getCartFoods().subscribe({ next: (foods) => this.selectedFoods = foods, error: (err) => console.log(err) }) } handleDeleteFood(f: ISFood){ let conf = confirm("Are you sure to delete this food ?"); if (conf == false) return; this.cartService.deleteFoodById(f.id).subscribe({ next: (data) => { let index = this.selectedFoods.indexOf(f); this.selectedFoods.splice(index, 1); } }) } command() }
